meanings.definition: Involving or done by two or more people or organizations working together
meanings.sent1: The students had a collaborative project where they worked together to build a model.
meanings.sent2: The collaborative effort between the two companies resulted in a successful product launch.
meanings.sent3: The collaborative chefs in the kitchen made a delicious meal for the guests.
meanings.sent4: Their collaborative spirit soared as they tackled the challenge together.
meanings.sent5: The collaborative nature of the team made the task seem effortless.

meanings.definition: A group of people working together on a project
meanings.sent1: The collaboratives gathered in the conference room to discuss the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: She joined the collaboratives to contribute her ideas to the research project.
meanings.sent3: The team of collaboratives celebrated their successful completion of the task.
meanings.sent4: The collaboratives formed a strong bond while working on the community project.
meanings.sent5: The group of collaboratives showed great teamwork in completing the assignment.
